languages.text: "Не могу больше! Клянусь — я тот же самый рычаг жала, что вчера! А он, вместо того чтоб повернуть ствол, плеснул в нас горячим маслом! Ну кто решил, что раз мы всю жизнь прессом для бумаги управляем, то и с древним орудием справимся? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Еще чуть{/d} — и эта штука нас самих угробит!" {n}Измученная рыжеволосая женщина едва не плачет, потирая свежий ожог на щеке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "К-как думаешь... не н-накажет нас Ликорто? Н-ну, мы ж тот шаттл н-не разнесли, как он г-говорил?" {n} Измученного вида рыжеволосая женщина то и дело теребит не то пуговицу воротника, не то кулон на шее.{/n}

languages.text: "I can't do this anymore! I pushed the exact same lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry? This thing is going to kill us {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}before long{/d}, I just know it!" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не могу больше! Клянусь — я тот же самый рычаг жала, что вчера! А он, вместо того чтоб повернуть ствол, плеснул в нас горячим маслом! Ну кто решил, что раз мы всю жизнь прессом для бумаги управляем, то и с древним орудием справимся? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Еще чуть{/d} — и эта штука нас самих угробит!" {n}Измученная рыжеволосая женщина едва не плачет, потирая свежий ожог на щеке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I can't do this anymore! I pushed the same exact lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! Who had the bright idea that since we'd operated a paper press all our lives we could handle an ancient gun as well?" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs a fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

Who had the bright idea that the experience of operating a paper press made us proficient in handling ancient weaponry?" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry?" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry?" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

"I can't do this anymore! I pushed the exact same lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry? This thing is going to kill us {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}before long{/d}, I just know it!" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich kann das nicht mehr! Ich habe genau denselben Hebel gezogen wie gestern, ich schwöre es! Aber anstatt den Lauf zu drehen, hat das Ding uns mit heißem Öl übergossen! Welches Genie dachte, dass der Betrieb einer Papierpresse mit der Bedienung einer alten Waffen vergleichbar ist? Dieses Ding wird uns {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}bald{/d} alle töten, das weiß ich einfach!" {n}Die erschöpfte rothaarige Frau ist den Tränen nah. Sie reibt sich die frische Verbrennung auf der Wange.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can't do this anymore! I pushed the exact same lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry? This thing is going to kill us {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}before long{/d}, I just know it!" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann das nicht mehr! Ich habe genau denselben Hebel gezogen wie gestern, ich schwöre es! Aber anstatt den Lauf zu drehen, hat das Ding uns mit heißem Öl übergossen! Wieso sollten wir bitte uralte Waffen bedienen können, nur weil wir mit einer Druckpresse umgehen können? Wer kommt auf so eine blöde Idee?" {n}Die erschöpfte rothaarige Frau ist den Tränen nah. Sie reibt sich die frische Verbrennung auf der Wange.{/n}

languages.text: « Ça peut plus continuer comme ça ! J'ai actionné le même levier qu'hier, je le jure ! Mais au lieu de faire tourner le canon, ça nous a aspergés d'huile bouillante ! Quel est le petit génie qui s'est dit que des gens sachant faire fonctionner une presse à papier seraient capables de manier une arme ancienne ? Ce truc {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}ne va pas tarder{/d} à nous tuer, je vous le dis ! »{n}Au bord des larmes, la rouquine épuisée frotte la brûlure récente sur sa joue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can't do this anymore! I pushed the exact same lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry? This thing is going to kill us {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}before long{/d}, I just know it!" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ça peut plus continuer comme ça ! J'ai actionné le même levier qu'hier, je le jure ! Mais au lieu de faire tourner le canon, ça nous a aspergés d'huile bouillante ! Quel est le petit génie qui s'est dit que des gens sachant faire fonctionner une presse à papier seraient capables de manier une arme ancienne ? Ce truc {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}ne va pas tarder{/d} à nous tuer, je vous le dis ! »{n}Au bord des larmes, la rouquine épuisée frotte la brûlure récente sur sa joue.{/n}

languages.text: “我再也受不了了！我发誓，我刚刚的操作和昨天一模一样！可它没有转动炮管，却把热油泼到了我们身上！到底是哪个天才说只要会操作压纸机，就能轻轻松松地使用古代武器？到底是谁这么想的？这玩意儿{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}用不了多久{/d}就会要了我们的命，我敢打包票！”{n}筋疲力尽的红发女人擦着脸颊上新添的烧伤，看上去快哭出来了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can't do this anymore! I pushed the exact same lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry? This thing is going to kill us {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}before long{/d}, I just know it!" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我再也受不了了！我发誓，我刚刚的操作和昨天一模一样！可它没有转动炮管，却把热油泼到了我们身上！是谁告诉我们，说有了操作压纸机的经验，就能熟练地使用古代武器？”{n}筋疲力尽的红发女人擦着脸颊上新添的烧伤，看上去快哭出来了。{/n}

languages.text: 「もうこれ以上は無理よ！昨日とまったく同じレバーを引いたのに、銃身が回転する代わりに熱い油が降ってきたわ！紙プレス機の操作経験が古代兵器の扱いに通じると思ったのはどこの誰よ？こいつは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}程なく{/d}私達みんなを殺すわ。そうに違いないわ！」{n}疲れ切って泣き出しそうな赤毛の女性は、頬の新しい火傷をこすりながら言った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can't do this anymore! I pushed the exact same lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry? This thing is going to kill us {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}before long{/d}, I just know it!" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もうこれ以上は無理よ！昨日とまったく同じレバーを引いたのに、銃身が回転する代わりに熱い油が降ってきたわ！紙プレス機の操作経験が古代兵器を扱うのに習熟していると思ったのは誰よ？」{n}疲れ切って泣き出しそうな赤毛の女性は、頬の新しい火傷をこすりながら言った。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Ya no puedo más! Accioné exactamente la misma palanca que ayer, ¡lo juro! Pero en lugar de girar el cañón, ¡nos salpicó con aceite caliente! ¿A qué lumbrera se le ha ocurrido que la experiencia de manejar una imprenta nos ayudaría en el manejo de armamento antiguo? ¡Este trasto nos va a matar {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}pronto{/d}, estoy segura!». {n}La agotada pelirroja está al borde de las lágrimas mientras se frota la quemadura reciente en la mejilla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can't do this anymore! I pushed the exact same lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! What genius thought that experience operating a paper press would translate into handling ancient weaponry? This thing is going to kill us {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}before long{/d}, I just know it!" {n}The exhausted red-headed woman is on the verge of tears as she rubs the fresh burn on her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya no puedo más! Accioné exactamente la misma palanca que ayer, ¡lo juro! Pero en lugar de girar el cañón, ¡nos salpicó con aceite caliente! ¿Quién tuvo la brillante idea de que la experiencia de manejar una imprenta nos hacía competentes en el manejo de armamento antiguo?». {n}La agotada pelirroja está al borde de las lágrimas mientras se frota la quemadura reciente en la mejilla.{/n}

languages.text: "Dayanamıyorum artık! Dün çektiğim kolun aynısını çektim, yemin ederim! Bu kez namluyu döndürmek yerine üstümüze kızgın yağ fışkırttı! Matbaa makinesi işletenleri kadim silahların idaresine atamak hangi sivri zekâlının fikriydi? Bu şeyin bizi gebertmesi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}yakındır{/d}, demedi deme!" {n}Kızıl saçlı yorgun kadın, yanağındaki taze yanığı ovalarken gözyaşlarını tutmakta zorlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can't do this anymore! I pushed the exact same lever I did yesterday, I swear! But instead of turning the barrel, it splashed us with hot oil! Matbaa makinesi işletenleri kadim silahların idaresine atamak hangi sivri zekâlının fikriydi? Bu şeyin bizi gebertmesi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}yakındır{/d}, demedi deme!" {n}Kızıl saçlı yorgun kadın, yanağındaki taze yanığı ovalarken gözyaşlarını tutmakta zorlanıyor.{/n}
